sentences.en: A handwritten note was tacked to the wall.
sentences.cn: 一张手写便条钉在墙上。

sentences.en: He had tacked this note to her door.
sentences.cn: 他已经把这张便条用图钉钉在了她的门上。

sentences.en: He is hammering a tack into the wall to hang a picture.
sentences.cn: 他正往墙上钉一枚平头钉用来挂画.

sentences.en: If that doesn’t work, we’ll try a different tack .
sentences.cn: 如果那样不行，我们将试试别的方法。

sentences.en: If you can't persuade him, try a new tack.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能劝服他, 那就试试新的方法吧.

sentences.en: If you cannot persuade him, try a new tack and offer him money.
sentences.cn: 如果你说服不了他, 那就换一种方法,给他钱.
我走投无路，于是改变了策略。

sentences.en: Pull it off, put tack and paper in vest pocket.
sentences.cn: 把它撕下来连大头针一起放进背心口袋里.

sentences.en: Tack the cord around the cushion.
sentences.cn: 用粗线沿着垫子边绷一圈。

sentences.en: Tack them together with a 1.5 cm seam.
sentences.cn: 用1.5厘米的针脚将它们暂时缝上。

sentences.en: That line didn't seem to register, so I took another tack.
sentences.cn: 看来这种说法不能引起他的注意, 我就采取另一种策略.

sentences.en: The captain ordered a change of tack.
The helmsman could tack the boat singlehanded.
sentences.cn: 舵手独自一人就能变换航向。

sentences.en: They tack a truck on to the passenger train.
sentences.cn: 他们在客车屁股上挂一辆敞车,就算货车.

sentences.en: This here crew is on a wrong tack, I do believe.
sentences.cn: 我想我们刚才都算是一时糊涂.

sentences.en: This report takes a different tack from the 20 that have come before.
sentences.cn: 这份报告和此前的20份报告采取的思路不同。

sentences.en: We were sailing on starboard tack.

words.tran_cn: 俗气的；发黏的；缺乏教养或风度的
敲平头钉器；敲平头钉的人
固定住；暂时缝上；附加；改变航向（tack的ing形式）
[五金]大头钉；粗缝；行动方针；食物

phrases.tran_cn: 讨价还价；打枣（一个工种名称）；加固套结

trans.tran_cn: [航]食物，劣质材料，赝品，方针，方法，航向
trans.tran_en: a small nail with a sharp point and a flat top
to attach something to a wall, board etc, using a tack

trans.tran_cn: 帆船抢风行驶，用粗线脚缝

trans.tran_en: If you tack something to a surface, you pin it there with tacks or thumbtacks
